data.title: Goleta climate: Average Temperature by month, Goleta water temperature
data.text:
>>Weather by month // weather averages Goleta

>>Climate graph // Weather by Month Goleta

>>average temperature by month Goleta

>>Weather Goleta

>>Water temperature Goleta

In Goleta, the climate is warm and temperate. The rain in Goleta falls mostly in the winter, with relatively little rain in the summer. This climate is considered to be Csa according to the Köppen-Geiger climate classification. The mean yearly temperature observed in Goleta is recorded to be 16.5 °C | 61.6 °F. Annually, approximately 412 mm | 16.2 inch of precipitation descends.

The given location is in the northern hemisphere. -> The particular spot is situated in the upper half of the planet. Summer begins at the end of June and ends in September. The months of summer are: June, July, August, September.

Climate graph // Weather by Month Goleta

The driest month is August. There is 1 mm | 0.0 inch of precipitation in August. In February, the precipitation reaches its peak, with an average of 97 mm | 3.8 inch.

average temperature by month Goleta

With an average of 22.3 °C | 72.1 °F, August is the warmest month. At 11.6 °C | 52.9 °F on average, December is the coldest month of the year.

Weather by month // weather averages Goleta

<>

Avg. Temperature °C (°F) Min. Temperature °C (°F) Max. Temperature °C (°F) Precipitation / Rainfall mm (in) Humidity (%) Rainy days (d) avg. Sun hours (hours)

January February March April May June July August September October November December

Data: 1991 - 2021 Min. Temperature °C (°F), Max. Temperature °C (°F), Precipitation / Rainfall mm (in), Humidity, Rainy days. Data: 1999 - 2019: avg. Sun hours

The precipitation varies 96 mm | 4 inch between the driest month and the wettest month. The variation in annual temperature is around 10.7 °C | 19.2 °F.

The month with the most relative humidity is February (62.63 %). The month with the least relative humidity is September (52.55 %). The wettest month is February (7.17 days), while the driest is August (0.30).

Goleta weather and climate for every month

Hours of sunshine in Goleta

avg. hours of sun

Total hours of sun

The month with the most daily hours of sunshine in Goleta is July, averaging 12.03 hours of sunshine. In total, there are 372.95 hours of sunshine throughout July.

In Goleta, the month that experiences the least amount of daily sunshine is January. On average, there are only about 7.78 hours of sunlight per day during this time. The total number of sunlit hours in a typical January amounts to approximately 241.24.

In Goleta, the yearly sum of sunshine is estimated to be around 3616.39 hours. On average, this equates to a monthly figure of approximately 118.77 hours for each month.

The average water temperature during the year located in Goleta (Pacific Ocean) at 15.40°C | 59.72°F.

At about 18.10°C | 64.58°F is the maximum of the water temperatures over the months. This will be reached in September. The low is 12.80°C | 55.04°F and is measured in April.

The date of the lowest water temperature is around April 11. At this time, it is about 12.80°C | 55.04°F. The maximum of 18.10°C | 64.58°F is measured around September 14.

The nearest water to Goleta is the Pacific Ocean.

Airport close to Goleta

The closest Airports of Goleta are: Santa Barbara Municipal Airport (SBA) 0.84km,Santa Maria Public Airport (SMX) 77.74km,San Luis Obispo County Regional Airport (SBP) 116.13km

You can reach Goleta from this Cities by Plane: Las Vegas (LAS), Denver (DEN)
